reviewText: Poor video resolution skips the drills are great but with the cd constantly skipping is hard to know exactly what the insttructor is running.

I love this dvd showing several new drills that I can use to teach new skill sets to our volleyball team. I was worried that it might not be in English but it is and is well illustrated. They have some girls that demonstrate each drill or move. Not only do they show the moves but they explain why they are doing each drill. The filming was okay but would have liked more angles on some drills, but if you know volleyball it is easy to figure out what they are doing. I would highly recommend this dvd.
